duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing maintenance, troubleshooting, and calibration of industrial equipment, electrical power circuits, control and automation systems.
Conducting preventative maintenance checks on various equipment and systems.
Identifying, reporting, and correcting safety and environmental concerns.
Maintaining electrical switch gear and power distribution systems.
Leading the development and implementation of changes based on advanced analytical testing.
Overseeing the construction and maintenance activities performed by third parties.

education_certification.credential: Two year Associate Degree in job related technical training or equivalent work experience.
